Cart Settings

The Cart is where your customers' products are placed as they shop on your store. This allows them to review the items they intend to purchase.

To customize this page, go to the drop-down menu and choose the Cart.

Choose the Cart section in the left-hand sidebar.

Settings#

1. Title background color#

Customize title background color (white, light, dark, primary, secondary, carbon effect, gradient).

2. Title background gradient#

Paste your CSS gradient code from sources like uiGradients.

3. Page subtitle#

You can add subtitle, if you need it.

4. Title alignment#

You can choose title positioning (left, center, right).

Summary#

1. Show note field#

You can enable/disable note field.

2. Note rows (height)#

You can manage the number of note rows.

3. Show payment icons#

You can enable/disable the Payment icons in the footer.
